txt.en: You are well on your way to becoming a Hero of Middle-earth. It is time to head for the Lone-lands.

'Some come to these lands because they are shunned, others to simply pass through. Some folk, like me, are here at the behest of others with nothing more than profit on the mind.\n\n'Which ilk are you?'
There are few Men dwelling in the Lone-lands, but those few dwell at an inn on the road east to the Trollshaws.
You have arrived at The Forskaen Inn in the Lone-lands

The Forsaken Inn lies along the Great East Road leading out of the South-gate in Bree. If you travel for a good while, you will find the inn on the north side of the road there.\n\nYou should find The Forsaken Inn and speak with the patrons there.
Talk to someone in The Forsaken Inn

The Forsaken Inn lies along the Great East Road leading out of the South-gate in Bree. If you travel for a good while, you will find the inn on the north side of the road there.\n\nYou should find The Forsaken Inn and speak with the patrons there.
